title: Can't make a PBE account
body: I was accepted onto the PBE but every time I try to make a PBE account it doesn't work, and the PBE page is having troubles loading. Also sometimes it does work but when i try to login on the PBE it says that it was incorrect username or password.

replies.body: I'm having the same problem except I confirmed with a person on the support staff that I in fact did get accepted. The page takes forever to load and doesn't look right and won't let me make my account. Pls help hyped to play on pbe.

I went ahead and pulled up your account to see why that PBE client is saying your username/password is wrong, and it looks like your account hasn't been accepted on the PBE servers quite yet. 

The client is saying your username and password are incorrect because that account doesn't actually exist yet. Keep a watch on your email so you can be sure to catch that PBE invitation when it comes!
